p: The structure of the three powders was characterized by X-ray diffraction. The XRD diagrams show that the raw powder and the argon-annealed powder have crystallized with a cubic Pm-3m structure and the powder annealed under air with a P2 1/n monoclinic structure ( Figure 2a). A refinement of the raw powder and the air-annealed powder was performed in order to determine the lattice parameters ( Figure 2bâ€“d).
